description:
The Luna Lumiere Selection Tournament is poised to begin, but the students of St. Friedeswiede are in for a shock when this year’s unexpected Cadets are revealed.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kusari Shiro ni Tsudou, Otome to Otome
Les jeunes filles enfermées dans le palais
Two Young Ladies Assemble at the Chained Castle
سيدتان صغيرتان تجتمعان في القلعة المصفدة
鎖城に集う, 乙女と乙女
